# PhysicsBodyMode.kinematic

**Case**

The user controls body movement.

## Declaration

```swift
case kinematic
```

## Setting the physics body mode

- **PhysicsBodyMode.static**: The body never moves.
- **PhysicsBodyMode.dynamic**: Forces and collisions control body movement.

items.description: Forces and collisions control body movement.
items.name: PhysicsBodyMode.dynamic

title: PhysicsBodyMode.kinematic
